name: The NightVeil Hold
description:
The NightVeil Hold is a third person ability based shooter, where you are an undead corpse of a powerful werewolf and have been tasked by your Vampire master to guard his coffin while he sleeps.

Get ready to protect your master as wave after wave the holy knights try to kill him as he sleeps

Links to all of the assets used is given in the Readme.md section of our GitHub repository: 

You can use the following abilities

Q - Quickly boost yourself in the direction you're facing
E - Slow down your perception of time, you are unaffected
Z - Call enemies towards you and give them a small amount of damage
X - Turn into your final form and wreak havoc for a small duration

Rewind and Berserk: When you die, you get rewound to your location 5 seconds back in time, and activate Berserk mode, so usually Death is just the beginning

In Berserk mode, you deal more damage, BUT, no health regen and if you die you die completely

other key binds
C(when near the coffin) - Repair the coffin, beware, you won't be able to repair the coffin much if it falls below a certain health

F(when near the coffin, in Vampire Phase) - Open the upgrade menu

1,2,3 changes weapons (....pssst, the crossbow has special upgrades)
